section.name: Domains Configuration
section.p: Domains define a subset of nodes from the repository and which users or groups have which role on the nodes in the domain. The domain are stored in the repository as childeren of the node /hippo:configuration/hippo:domains. The domain rule nodes and facet rule subnodes define the subset of nodes from the repository. The auth role nodes define who can do what in the domain.

section.name: Structure
section.source: hippo:configuration `-- hippo:domains `-- mydomain |-- hippo:domainrule | |-- hippo:facetrule | `-- hippo:facetrule |-- hippo:domainrule | |-- hippo:facetrule | |-- hippo:facetrule | `-- hippo:facetrule |-- hippo:domainrule | `-- hippo:facetrule |-- hippo:authrole `-- hippo:authrole

subsection.name: hippo:domain
subsection.p: The hippo:domain can hold multiple hippo:domainrule and hippo:authrole nodes.

subsection.name: hippo:domainrule
subsection.p: The hippo:domainrule can hold multiple hippo:facetrule nodes.

subsection.name: hippo:facetrule
subsection.source: <sv:node sv:name="hippo:facetrule"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hippo:facetrule</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:facet" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>category</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:value" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>news</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:type" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>String</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:equals" sv:type="Boolean"> <sv:value>true</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>

tr.td: The name of the facet to match. A special value of nodetype can be set to check if a node if of a type, either it's primary type, an inherited type or a mixin type.

The value of the facet to match. Four special values can be used:
* : match everything
__role__ : match the users role (for the domain)
__user__ : match the username
__group__ : match any of the user's groups
The property type of the facet. Must be either String or Name.
Whether the value must match or must not match. If a not match (false) is set the facet must exist on the node.

tr.td: The role to assign to users or groups to the domain.
The users that have the role on the domain.
The groups that have the role on the domain.
